div.div: at Gettysburg, Pa. | Shirk at Musselman

tr.td: GC wins toss, elects to receive. F&M takes south goal
Cody Hubbs kickoff 55 yards to the GC10, Jordan Kelso return 33 yards to the GC43, out-of-bounds (Jalijah Daniels).
Danny Thompson pass complete to C. Flashenberg for 17 yards to the FMC40, 1ST DOWN GC (Ben Okun).
Danny Thompson rush for 1 yard to the FMC39 (Steve Elf).
Ryan Thompson rush for loss of 2 yards to the FMC41 (M. Fenstermache).
Danny Thompson pass incomplete to Ty Abdul-Karim (Jeff Leone).
